articles.author: Bitcoin
articles.summary: The recent inaugural NYC Digital Asset Summit Roundtable was hosted by Mayor Eric Adams. It focused on New York City's strategy for digital asset development and digital media development.   It was held at the New York's Eric Adams Center for Digital Media, hosted by the Mayor.

articles.title: The $100K Mirage: Bitcoin's Rally Not Backed By On-Chain Strength
articles.author: News BTC
articles.summary: Bitcoin briefly climbed back above $100,000 this month, pushing close to the $108,000 level before a new pullback. According to reports from Glassnode, much of that surge came from traders using borrowed funds. Speculative Bets Fuel Recent Rally.

articles.summary: Individuals, schools, and mosques in Iran are illegally mining Bitcoin to avoid high bills. It's difficult to estimate the amount of Bitcoin they have in their accounts, so it's hard to estimate their BTC holdings.       in Iran.
